name: PPWcode Util OddsAndEnds (.NET)
body:
## Welcome to PPWCode.Util.OddsAndEnds!
PPWCode.Util.OddsAndEnds is a .NET library that is part of the PPWCode project.
It consists of a collection of several small helpers and utility code.

## Getting started
The current version of the library is mark II, designed to work with Microsoft .NET 4.5.
The library is available as the NuGet package `PPWCode.Util.OddsAndEnds.II` in the [NuGet gallery].

## Authors and Contributors
The main authors of the `PPWCode.Util.OddsAndEnds` library are @dvdwouwe, @rvdginste, @jandppw.
A complete list of the contributors can be found in
